answerText: The Plastics[10] North Shore High School is the setting of this film starring Lindsay Lohan, which was written by Tina Fey. Its title is an apt description of the behavior of the Plastics.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 3 | 4 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: "On Wednesdays we wear pink" is one of the rules of this clique at North Shore High School.  [10] Name this clique led by Regina George, whose other rules include not wearing sweatpants and only wearing your hair in a ponytail once a week.
